name: Fracture

additionalTooltips.title: Charged Echoes
additionalTooltips.description:
Add [corrupt] by playing [infused] cards. The Wurmkin use [corrupt] to power spells and abilities.

[corrupt] can exceed [emptycorrupt] but excess [corrupt] will be removed at end of turn.

cardLoreTooltips: The glowing crystals found throughout the tunnels below — Echoes as the Wurmkin call them — hold a dormant power. This power is ancient, to be sure, but strangely familiar. Yet, the more I walk these musty tunnels, the more I begin to feel these Echoes stir.
